token_info.name: Floating Utopia #1 (2021)
token_info.description: We create reconstructions of natural landscapes, embedding another ecosystem into them - the ecology of machines. They are hybrid patches that fill the gaps in the planetâ€™s epidermis, which are inhabited by a variety of myths and weird inhabitants - datasets involved in rehearsing the end of the world and visualizing its recovery. Cloud 1 - reconstructed beach view from surveillance camera. Created using 3d photo inpainting network. Format - 3d point cloud.
